snippet: Bradley Cooper, People’s Sexiest Man Alive in 2011, will take on one of acting’s most unflattering roles, in the Williamstown Theater Festival’s revival of “The Elephant Man.”
abstract: Bradley Cooper will portray a deformed man in the Williamstown Theater Festival’s revival of the Bernard Pomerance play The Elephant Man.
lead_paragraph: Bradley Cooper, People’s Sexiest Man Alive in 2011, will take on one of acting’s most unflattering roles, in the Williamstown Theater Festival’s revival of “The Elephant Man.”
